description: This file is a Node.js script that packages build artifacts into a Tizen .wgt ZIP archive. It reads files from the 'dist' directory, includes a config.xml, and creates a ZIP archive without external dependencies, using manual ZIP file structure implementation.

methods.name: collectFiles
methods.description: Recursively collects all non-hidden files from a directory, returning their relative paths with forward slashes.

methods.name: crc32
methods.description: Calculates CRC32 checksum for a given buffer, used for ZIP file integrity.

methods.name: writeUInt16LE
methods.description: Creates a Buffer with a 16-bit unsigned integer in little-endian format.

methods.name: writeUInt32LE
methods.description: Creates a Buffer with a 32-bit unsigned integer in little-endian format.

methods.name: dosDateTime
methods.description: Converts a Date object into DOS date and time format used in ZIP headers.

methods.name: createStoredLocalHeader
methods.description: Creates a local file header for ZIP with no compression, including CRC and size info.

methods.name: createCentralDirectoryRecord
methods.description: Creates a central directory record for a ZIP file entry.

methods.name: createEndOfCentralDirectory
methods.description: Creates the end of central directory record for ZIP archive.

methods.name: ensureExists
methods.description: Checks if a directory or file exists, throws error if not.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that orchestrates packaging process: collects files, writes ZIP structure, and outputs the archive.
